text: Alain Koudou (born 21 October 1984), commonly known as Arunina, is an Ivorian footballer. ==Career== He began his career in the Académie de Sol Beni was 2004 promoted to ASEC Mimosas scored here in 13 games, 17 goals and moved in January 2005 to Belgium-based club KSK Beveren. Who has played 3 years moved than to R.O.C. de Charleroi-Marchienne and joined only 1 year later on 1 September 2008 to C.S. Visé. ==References== ==External links== * Footgoal Profile Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Ivorian footballers Category:Ivorian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Belgium Category:Expatriate footballers in France Category:K.S.K. title: Alain Koudou
